messages.title: It's Time to Build a Brighter Future
messages.content: Millions of voters are switching to the Liberal Democrats to stop Boris Johnson destroying public services. We have been joined by MPs from Labour and the Conservatives fed up with the broken politics the two old parties represent. The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning European Election result in May when the party beat both Labour and the Conservatives. Our Country deserves better than a choice between two divisive leaders like Boris Johnson and Jeremy Corbyn. The Liberal Democrats are fighting for proper funding for our NHS and schools. We want to mend our broken politics and build a brighter future for our country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Aim to generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give Every Child the Best Start in Life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Spend and extra £10 billion a year on education, investing in schools and recruiting 20,000 more teachers.
Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.
Ensure that mental health is treated with the same urgency and priority as physical health.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Recent election results show a resurgence in Lib Dem support since the last General Election in 2017. The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning European Election result in May when the party beat both Labour and the Conservatives.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
issues.economy: Build a Fairer Economy, providing free childcare from 9 months and giving every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.
issues.education: Give Every Child the Best Start in Life by spending and extra £10 billion a year on education, investing in schools and recruiting 20,000 more teachers.
issues.environment: Tackle the Climate Emergency. We aim to generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.
issues.health: Transform Our Mental Health Service so that mental health is treated with the same urgency and priority as physical health.

examples: Millions of voters are switching to the Liberal Democrats.
Spend and extra £10 billion a year on education.
Stop Boris Johnson destroying public services.
The Liberal Democrats are fighting for proper funding for our NHS and schools.
We want to mend our broken politics and build a brighter future for our country.
Our Country deserves better than a choice between two divisive leaders like Boris Johnson and Jeremy Corbyn.
So that mental health is treated with the same urgency and priority as physical health.
Stop Boris Johnson destroying public services.
Our Country deserves better than a choice between two divisive leaders like Boris Johnson and Jeremy Corbyn.
Fed up with the broken politics the two old parties represent.
